summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal waterworks system; providing for the acquisition of a certain franchise for, and the construction of, pipe lines on certain streets in the vicinity of Haller Lake; designating the same as additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the municipal water works system contemplated by Ordinance No. 62959 (as amended); making an appropriation therefor, and accepting the offers of Haller Lake Improvement Club, et al., and of the Washington Emergency Relief Administration in connection therewith.
